ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Relationship of the respondent to the child
Relationship of the respondent to the child - If ''Other'', explain:
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Alcoholic beverages (beer, wine, spirits, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Tobacco products (cigarettes, chewing tobacco, cigars, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Cannabis (marijuana, pot, grass, hash, dagga, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Cocaine (coke, crack, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Amphetamine-type stimulants (speed, diet pills, ecstasy, Tik, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Inhalants (nitrous, glue, petrol, paint thinner, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Sedatives or sleeping pills (Valium, Serepax, Rohypnol, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Hallucinogens (LSD, acid, mushrooms, PCP, Special K, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Opioids (heroin, morphine, methadone, codeine, etc.)
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Other
Did you use any of the following substances during pregnancy? Unknown
If you used ''other'' substance during pregnancy, describe:
If yes to alcoholic beverages during pregnancy (aseq_0_1): Did you use any alcoholic beverages (beer, wine, spirits, etc.) during the first trimester?
If yes to drinking alcoholic beverages during the first trimester, how many times did you drink per week in the first trimester?
Notes: 1 = Once per week or less; 2 = Two to three times per week; 3 = Four to six times per week; 4 = Daily; 999 = Unknown

ElementDescription: During 1st trimester of pregnancy with Index Child, how many alcoholic drinks did Biological Mom have on a typical day
Notes: 1 = < 2 drinks per episode; 2= 2-3 drinks per episode; 3= 4+ drinks per episode; 999= Not sure how to calculate; 77777=Don''t Know; 99999= Not Applicable

ElementDescription: If greater than 4 drinks, please specify an average number of drinks per episode 1:

If unsure, please describe alcohol type and quantity here (e.g., 330 ml beers): Please describe it fully and carefully, including brand name of alcohol (if applicable), format (can or bottle), size of can/bottle, and how many cans/bottles (first time).
If yes to tobacco products during pregnancy (Q0): did you use any tobacco products (cigarettes, chewing tobacco, cigars, etc.) during the first trimester?
If yes to tobacco products during the first trimester, on average, how many cigarettes did you use per day in the first trimester? (Note: Tobacco is the only substance that asks about usage per day.)
Notes: 1 = 10 or less cigarettes per day; 2 = 11 to 20 cigarettes per day; 3 = 21 to 30 cigarettes per day; 4 = 31 cigarettes or more per day; 5 = Did not use cigarettes as primary method of tobacco usage; 999 = Unknown
